Audio.h File Reference

Master include file for the library USB Audio Class driver. More...

#include "../HighLevel/USBMode.h"
#include "../../USB.h"
#include "../Common/Audio.h"
#include <string.h>

Detailed Description

Master include file for the library USB Audio Class driver, for both host and device modes, where available.

This file should be included in all user projects making use of this optional class driver, instead of including any headers in the USB/ClassDriver/Device, USB/ClassDriver/Host or USB/ClassDriver/Common subdirectories.
